title: Mendelssohn: Piano Trios - Klaviertrio Amsterdam (1999)
description:
This recording of Mendelssohn's Piano Trios was acclaimed by the New York critic Harris Goldsmith in International Record Review as 'the best CD of the year 2000'.


FELIX MENDELSSOHN (1809-1847)
Piano Trio No.1 in D minor Op.49
1. I. Molto allegro ed agitato (8'56)
2. II. Andante con moto tranquillo (6'22)
3. III. Scherzo: Leggiero e vivace (3'26)
4. IV. Finale: Allegro assai appassionato (8'09)
Piano Trio No.2 in C minor Op.66
5. I. Allegro energico e con fuoco (10'05)
6. II. Andante espressivo (6'45)
7. III. Scherzo: Molto allegro quasi presto (3'40)
8. IV. Finale: Allegro appassionato (7'10)
Total time: 54'47

Joan Berkhemer, violin
Nadia David, cello

Recording: 1999, Hervormde Kerk Rhoon, The Netherlands
